casualLeaders.name: Scoot, The Over Worked Nursery Worker
casualLeaders.bio: Scoot uses baby Pokémon and its past their bedtime.

casualLeaders.name: Rune the Dragon Collector
casualLeaders.bio: Launch yourself at mach speeds to get the Dragon Dart Badge.

casualLeaders.name: Soundwave, Communications Expert
casualLeaders.bio: There's more than meets the eye! A strong bolt of lightning, and a mental magic trick or two should be enough to fry his circuits.

casualLeaders.name: Prof. Cedar, the Researching Sightseer
casualLeaders.bio: Those that are well traveled might have a chance at an Intrepid Badge!

casualLeaders.name: MacDuff, the Furtive Heritor
casualLeaders.bio: MacDuff uses dark types. Use fairy and fighting types to clear them away.

casualLeaders.name: Violetta, the Mad Mauve Matron
casualLeaders.bio: Use your mind to keep Violetta grounded and defeat her precious purple Pokémon to earn the Medicine? Badge!

casualLeaders.name: Captain Gyaraga, The Mysterious Space Pilot
casualLeaders.bio: Dreams, Fun and Inspiration. Appears to have made from scraps of the Galaga army ships you just destroyed. Looks familiar...

casualLeaders.name: Mr. Resetti, the Reset Surveillance Specialist
casualLeaders.bio: Mr. Resetti specializes in Ground types, so bring your best Grass, Ice, and Water Pokémon!

casualLeaders.name: Drak Sky, the Daring Dragoon
casualLeaders.bio: Show Drak a good balance between offense and defense to find the true Royal Arms Badge.

casualLeaders.name: Mariana, Explorer of the Depths
casualLeaders.bio: Will your electrifying spirit turn the tides of battle and earn you the Abyssal Badge?

casualLeaders.name: Team Snakemouth, The Guild's Finest
casualLeaders.bio: We've survived enough Rock Slides to know that even if there's a chance of making it through, we can squeeze past any obstacle you throw at us! Though fire is still a bit of a problem, and those rocks really do hurt...

casualLeaders.name: Team Snakemouth, The Guild's Finest
casualLeaders.bio: We've survived enough Rock Slides to know that even if there's a chance of making it through, we can squeeze past any obstacle you throw at us! Though fire is still a bit of a problem, and those rocks really do hurt...

veteranLeaders.name: Erkenhelm, The Ultimate Dragon Slayer
veteranLeaders.bio: Outlast the onslaught of Dragon Slayer magic to earn the Dragon Slayer Badge!

veteranLeaders.name: Glitch, Master of Birbs
veteranLeaders.bio: Can you prove yourself to me and show that you can tame even the fiercest of birds of prey and become their friend?

veteranLeaders.name: Gus, The Bug Creep
veteranLeaders.bio: Gus uses bug types! Hit him with fire attacks to get the upper wing!

veteranLeaders.name: Loopy, the Poke-Cosplayer
veteranLeaders.bio: Loopy enjoys battles in extreme conditions! Be prepared to weather the storm or shut it down.

veteranLeaders.name: TohruChu, The Poisonous
veteranLeaders.bio: Only an earthquake can shake TohruChu to his poisonous core.

veteranLeaders.name: Volcanus, the Frosty Flame
veteranLeaders.bio: Survive the elements to earn the Freezeflame badge!

veteranLeaders.name: Lionheart, the Master Magi
veteranLeaders.bio: Outduel the champion of Vellara to earn the Master Magi Rune... er, Badge!

veteranLeaders.name: Ian, Tavern Keeper
veteranLeaders.bio: A good balance is always necessary, can you out prepare these adventurers to secure the badge?

veteranLeaders.name: Perseverance, the Extraplanetary Geologist
veteranLeaders.bio: Erode away Perseverance's well-grounded team to earn the Rover Badge!

veteranLeaders.name: Nathaniel, The Prodigal Archaeologist
veteranLeaders.bio: Foresee a future of victory and seize it to claim Nathaniel's Lost Badge!

veteranLeaders.name: Yoshi, the small Wing buffer
veteranLeaders.bio: If you are able to Smack Down their hungry wings, you will receive Wing Badge.

elites.name: Aidan, The Dragon Master
elites.bio: Defeat Aidan's ~~Salamence~~ dragon pokemon to earn the Salamence Type Badge

elites.name: Simple Kenny, The Kirby Otaku
elites.bio: Bring your best team and claim the Kirby Otaku Badge!

elites.name: Haga-P, Producer of the Poke-Band
elites.bio: Who is ready to ROOOOOOOCK! It's the battle of the bands! Show your Pokemon's sounds to Haga-P and his band, and earn the Groove badge!

elites.name: Lunella, The Lunar Stargazer
elites.bio: Lunella uses Dark and nocturnal Pokemon. Fairy and Fighting types are sure to shine a bright light on her to earn you the Nocturnal Badge.

elites.name: The King of Winter, the Bringer of the Storm
elites.badgeName: Veteran of the Long Night Emblem
elites.bio: The Long Night is dark and full of ghosts!

champions.name: Hiyoko, the High-Flying Hunter-Gatherer!
champions.bio: Clip her team's wings to earn your place in the PAX Pokémon League Hall of Fame!
